resources.string: This is a social app where you can donate resources to someone that really need it.
Become a donor and you will have the opportunity to see profiles of people in need and help them.
Be a volunteer and help to register and manage the profiles of people that need help.
If you have a Liquid Galxy System installed you can view all this info into a spectacular panoramic screens.
You also can continue with Google:
Here you can consult our statistics:
This user already exists!Choose another name.
Enter a valid username. Username must have at least 4 characters
Introduce a valid password.Password must have at least 6 characters
You have to fill this field
What can you do if you register as volunteer?

1. You can connect with people without resources who need our help 

 2. You can create and manage profiles for them, since they do not always have a mobile phone connected to the Internet 

 3. You can help to make the donation delivery in case the donors do not have the possibility to do it personally
What can you do if you register as donor?

1. You can help people without basic resources such as food, accommodation or clothing 

 2. You can choose the profile of the person who most attracts your attention and help them 

 3. You can donate food, clothing, accommodation, work or personal hygiene products 

 4. You can deliver the aid personally or with the help of a volunteer
